name: Treasure hunter DIGGY
description:
Before your father dies. He have given you a map of the treasure.
But it's not complete. There are other parts of the map buried in this small village. When you find all the clues,
it will lead to treasure That will make you rich!

For the first time, I tried to do this in low resolution.
Maybe something is stuck, I apologize.

How to play
arrow : move to direction.

Z: dig I warn you, Don't try to dig randomly. Because it will cause the shovel to break quickly

X: see map to  interpret clues

ENTER: to enter game, accept sometime.

--BGM I download from internet long ago I can't find the original.

--sound effect from  https://freesound.org/

ENJOY FOR THIS GAME...!
